quotes.quote: Just as plants soak up water, your children need your loving words, and with them they will thrive.
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
The time is always right to do what is right.
Please understand my friend, that where you find yourself tomorrow is a function of the positive decisions and actions you take today.
The minute you're satisfied with where you are, you aren't there anymore.
They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
Risk is essential. There is not growth of inspiration in staying within what is safe and comfortable. Once you find out what you do best, why not try something else?
Growth is a spiral process, doubling back on itself, reassessing and regrouping.

With everything that has happened to you, you can either feel sorry for yourself or treat what has happened as a gift. Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
Today is a new beginning, a chance to turn your failures into achievements & your sorrows into so goods. No room for excuses.
If we're growing, we're always going to be out of our comfort zone.
The way to gain a good reputation, is to endeavor to be what you desire to appear.
We only become what we are by the radical and deep-seated refusal of that which others have made of us.
Our business in life is not to get ahead of other people, but to get ahead of ourselves.
He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
Chaos in the world brings uneasiness, but it also allows the opportunity for creativity and growth.
There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you're climbing it.
Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
Man's duty is to improve himself; to cultivate his mind; and, when he finds himself going astray, to bring the moral law to bear upon himself.
Whatever helps to shape the human being - to make the individual what he is, or hinder him from being what he is not - is part of his education.
Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
The whole point of being alive is to evolve into the complete person you were intended to be.
The great thing in the world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
He who moves not forward, goes backward.
Change and growth take place when a person has risked himself and dares to become involved with experimenting with his own life.
When you're finished changing, you're finished.
Growth begins when we begin to accept our own weakness.
My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure.
You can never solve a problem with the same kind of thinking that created the problem in the first place.
Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
Not knowing you can't do something, is sometimes all it takes to do it.
Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed no hope at all.
Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Most people never run far enough on the first wind to find out they've got a second. Give your dreams all you've got, and you'll be amazed at the energy that comes out of you.
Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
Some people are molded by their admirations, others by their hostilities.
In the end, it is the person you become, not the things you have achieved, that is the most important.
If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous, unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
One can choose to go back toward safety or forward toward growth. Growth must be chosen again and again, fear must be overcome again and again.
Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but unlearning old limits.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
The tragedy in life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goal to reach.
Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
Whatever makes you uncomfortable is your biggest opportunity for growth.
Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What's important is the action. You don't have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Recognizing that you are not where you want to be is a starting point to begin changing your life.
You are the one that possesses the keys to your being. You carry the passport to your own happiness.
Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experiences that reveals the human spirit.
There are two ways of spreading light, to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.
Don't go through life, grow through life.
If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
It's never too late to become what you might have been.
I learned to always take on things I’d never done before. Growth and comfort do not coexist.
We should not judge people by their peak of excellence, but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
Take criticism seriously, but not personally. If there is truth or merit in the criticism, try to learn from it. Otherwise, let it roll right off you.
It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all in which case, you fail by default.
What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
Change is inevitable. Growth is optional.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
When someone tells me 'no,' it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them.
If you don't make the time to work on creating the life you want, you're eventually going to be forced to spend a lot of time dealing with a life you don't want.
The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
I've got a theory that if you give 100% all the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure.
What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Be patient with yourself. You are growing stronger every day. The weight of the world will become lighter and you will begin to shine brighter. Don't give up.
The tiny seed knew that in order to grow, it needed to be dropped in dirt, covered with darkness, and struggle to reach the light.
You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.
Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender, it's holy ground. There's no greater investment.
Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
With self-discipline most anything is possible.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
There's only one growth strategy work hard.
Follow your honest convictions, and stay strong.
